description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors for the supply, delivery and installation of one (1) fully functional 13’ x 80’ Geared Head Lathe and one (1) 21’ x 80’ variable speed lathe for the Department of National Defence in Kingston, Ontario.
full_summary:
Government of Canada
Tender Announcement
WS3713915257 - Supply of Two (2) Lathes

### Notice Information
* Publication Date: October 19, 2022
* Tender Closing Date and Time: November 15, 2022, 14:00 (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 17, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2023
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Procurement Description
Canada is soliciting offers from qualified suppliers for the supply, delivery, and installation of two (2) lathes in Kingston, Ontario. The equipment specified consists of one (1) geared head lathe (13” x 80”) and one (1) variable speed lathe (21” x 80”).

* The Lathes are required for the Department of National Defence’s operations in Kingston, Ontario.
* The equipment must be received by the end user on or before March 31, 2023.

### Tender Requirements
* Tender submissions must be received by November 15, 2022, at 14:00 (EST).
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on or before the tender closing date and time.
* Failure to meet the tender submission deadline may result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Barltrop, David (SPAC/PSPC)
david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14407061?extsite=MTQ0MDcwNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
